Package classes

Class Order

java.lang.Object
classes.Order
public class Order extends Object
Order is a class that handles the order instance and its methods such as the Timed deliveries

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    Order(Item item, int amt, double rew, String msg, double chance, double distance)
    Creates a new Order object

  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order(Item item, int amt, double rew, String msg, double chance, double distance)
      Creates a new Order object
      Parameters:
      item - Item requested by the order
      amt - Amount of the said item requested by the order
      rew - Reward (in yarnCoins) of the order once completed
      msg - Displayed message when an order is triggered
      chance - Double between 0.0 - 1.0. It is the chance of an order to trigger once rolled
      duration - Amount of seconds for the Player to complete an order

  • Method Details

    • rollOrder

      public static void rollOrder()
      Rolls a random order from orderList. It then triggers triggerOrder() method of the rolled order

    • rollOrderChance

      public boolean rollOrderChance()
      Rolls the chance of an order to be triggered
      Returns:
      Boolean indicating whether an order is triggered or not

    • triggerOrder

      public void triggerOrder()
      Adds an order to Player's orderList and also starts a timer for the duration of the order before it is removed from orderList

    • completedOrder

      public void completedOrder(Courier chosen) throws NotEnoughItemException
      Checks whether player has enough items to complete order and if it does, it will select a courier then trigger deliverOrder() method
      Parameters:
      chosen -
      Throws:
      NotEnoughItemException

    • deliverOrder

      public void deliverOrder(Courier cour)
      Calculates deliTime with courier speed and order's distance. It then proceeds to run a TimerTask for the yarn coin reward with the calculated deliTime

    • getRequestedItem

      public Item getRequestedItem()
      Returns the requestedItem of an order
      Returns:
      Requested item of an order as an Item instance

    • getAmount

      public int getAmount()
      Returns the amount of an item requested by the order
      Returns:
      Integer amount of an item requested by the order

    • getReward

      public double getReward()
      Returns the amount of yarn coins offered by an order as a reward
      Returns:
      Reward of the order as a double

    • getMsg

      public String getMsg()
      Returns the description or message to the player of the order
      Returns:
      String description or message to the player of the order

    • isBeingDelivered

      public boolean isBeingDelivered()
      Returns a boolean indicating whether an order is being delivered or not
      Returns:
      Boolean indicating whether an order is being delivered or not
